text: Rwisai avo vasingatendi kuna Allah nezuva rekupedzisira, uye vasingarambidzi izvo zvakarambidzwa naAllah nemutumwa wavo (Muhammad (SAW)), neavo vasingatambiri chitendero chechokwadi (Islaam) pakati peavo vakapihwa Gwaro (maJudha nemaKristu) kusvikira vabhadhara Jizyah (mari inobviswa nemaJudha nemaKristu ari pasi pechengetedzo yehurumende yemaMuslim) vachida nemwoyo yavo, uye vachizvininipisa pachavo
